ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] RE: Welcome to shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO, dex is worthless for a SK less ya got some sorta procing weapon...Go AC first, then STR, then agility.. ... From: (Lasombra Shadowfiend)
ygData.messageBody:
IMO, dex is worthless for a SK less ya got some sorta procing weapon...Go AC
first, then STR, then agility..
----- Original Message -----
From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
To: "'(Shadowknight)'" <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 5:49 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] RE: Welcome to shadowknight


> From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
>
> I am new to this list, and hope it is pretty active.
>
> This is not my first character or Shadow Knight for that matter, but I
lost
> touch because my lag issues made my TSK not very fun to play. I am
starting
> over with a DE SK and have some questions.
>
> What armor, not blackened, is better than Banded or Bronze for AC?
> What 1HS weapon is best and what is in your off hand? I am looking into
> getting a Barbed Whip in Najena, and a CGS from Sol.
>
> What stats increasing items are best? Strength and Dex?
>
> Thanks.
>
> --
> Lasombra Shadowfiend
> 1st Tier of Hate
>
